browser_type.title: Browser Type
browser_type.description: Browser to use for automation (chromium, firefox, or webkit)

headless.title: Headless Mode
headless.description: Run browser in headless mode (without UI)

use_apify_proxy.title: Use Apify Proxy
use_apify_proxy.description: Use Apify's proxy service for requests

apify_proxy_groups.title: Apify Proxy Groups
apify_proxy_groups.description: Proxy groups to use (e.g., RESIDENTIAL, SHADER, BUYPROXIES94952)

stealth_mode.title: Stealth Mode
stealth_mode.description: Enable anti-detection features to avoid bot detection

template.title: Pre-built Template
template.description: Use a pre-built template (amazon_product_search, google_search, linkedin_profile, twitter_scrape, google_maps_business)

template_params.title: Template Parameters
template_params.description: Parameters for the selected template (e.g., search_query, max_results)

export_format.title: Export Format
export_format.description: Format to export extracted data (json, csv, or excel)

actions.title: Automation Actions
actions.description: Array of browser automation actions to execute sequentially

type.title: Action Type
type.description: Type of action: navigate, click, fill, select, screenshot, extract_text, etc.

selector.title: Element Selector
selector.description: CSS selector, XPath, or text to identify the element

value.title: Value
value.description: Value for the action (URL for navigate, text for fill, etc.)

selector_type.title: Selector Type
selector_type.description: Type of selector: css, xpath, text, role, or auto

timeout.title: Timeout (ms)
timeout.description: Maximum time to wait for action completion in milliseconds
